-------------------------------1242919114
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Language: en

By Fraud, I was referring his using your name to sell his things, unless he=
 
 has permission, then you can correct him in his terminology.
 
 
In a me=
ssage dated 5/21/2009 11:11:31 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
purplealiengir=
l@... writes:

 
 


It's not fraud, these hack boxes work, it's just=
 the guy has no  clue how 
it works, and trends mis-represent it's function=
.  RS is in fact  
discontiuing the radios, although there appears the othe=
r--more expensive  radios that 
would work as boxes. 
 
 I know, I get kind=
a harsh, but if someone to set themselves up as  
experts, at least underst=
and the damn concepts  involved. Don't keep  regurgitating 
the same urban =
myth crap that everyone else throws out there as  facts.
 
 Frank-S


On Th=
u, May 21, 2009 at 8:49 AM, <_SnowfireL@..._ 
(mailto:SnowfireL@...=
) >  wrote:


 
 


It's none of my business but, Frank will need to call e=
bay the  number can 
be found in the security section, and he will have to =
let them  know they 
are committing fraud, otherwise nothing will be done. =
 I saw  these ads on 
ebay too, but I thought, Frank may have been trying t=
o earn  some money for all 
his hard work, nothing wrong with that either, =
that was  before I joined 
these groups. sf
 

 

 




In a message dated =
5/21/2009 10:45:09 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
_april@abercrombieghapril@a=
bercrapr_ (mailto:april@...)  
writes:

 
 


Yeah=
-the seller, but you can't contact  the bidders.

Been following this unprofessional idiot's  items for aw=
hile now. I love 
how he says that Frank charges  thousands of dollars for =
an original Frank's 
box. 

This dude  is the worst type of con, preying on=
 people who know only enough 
to  be familiar with the term Frank's box. Th=
en again, it always has  
bothered me when people take shack hacks and char=
ge stupid prices  for them on 
ebay under the Frank's box moniker.

This gu=
y is  based out of Nevada I believe, and his group's ethics leave 
little  =
to be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon...

Andy
